message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $10,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm looking to save some money.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your desire to save, however, $6,000 significantly undervalues this product. I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about we aim for $7,500?
